b2s_clf.dataset_transformer package¶

Submodules¶

b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.dataset_transformer module¶

class b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.dataset_transformer.DatasetTransformer(transformer_list, kwargs_list, input_cols_list)[source]¶

Bases: object

A superclass that initializes data set transformation child classes.

b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.encoder module¶

class b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.encoder.Encoder(transformer_list, kwargs_list, input_cols_list, target_col_list)[source]¶

Bases: b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.dataset_transformer.DatasetTransformer

A class that implements a series of transformations to a data set based in categorical data encoding.

fit(df, verbose=False)[source]¶

Fits all categorical encoders in present in self.transformer_list.

Parameters

  • df – pandas.DataFrame with fit data.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

fit_transform(df, verbose=False)[source]¶

Fits all categorical encoders in present in self.transformer_list and return a transformation of the training set.

Parameters

  • df – pandas.DataFrame with fit data.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

Returns

Transformed training set.

Return type

df

transform(df, verbose=False)[source]¶

Transforms data using all encoders fitted in self.fitted_objects.

Parameters

  • df – pandas.DataFrame with data to transform.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

Returns

Transformed data set.

Return type

df

b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.normalizer module¶

class b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.normalizer.Normalizer(transformer_list, kwargs_list, input_cols_list)[source]¶

Bases: b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.dataset_transformer.DatasetTransformer

A class that implements a series of transformations to a data set based in variable normalization.

fit(df, verbose=False)[source]¶

Fits all normalizers in present in self.transformer_list.

Parameters

  • df – pandas.DataFrame with fit data.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

fit_transform(df, verbose=False)[source]¶

Fits all normalizers in present in self.transformer_list and return a transformation of the training set.

Parameters

  • df – pandas.DataFrame with fit data.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

Returns

Transformed training set.

Return type

df

transform(df, verbose=False)[source]¶

Transforms data using all normalizers fitted in self.fitted_objects.

Parameters

  • df – pandas.DataFrame with data to transform.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

Returns

Transformed data set.

Return type

df

b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.signal_compressor module¶

class b2s_clf.dataset_transformer.signal_compressor.SignalCompressor(n_clusters_list, input_cols_list, apply_estimator_list)[source]¶

Bases: object

A class that performs compression on signal data.

fit(df, verbose=False)[source]¶

Fits clusters according to variable groups present in self.input_cols_list. These will be used to compress signal data.

Parameters

  • df – pandas.DataFrame with signal data.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

transform(df, verbose=False)[source]¶

Compresses signal data using all clusters fitted in self.signal_clusters.

Parameters

  • df – pandas.DataFrame with signal data to compress.

  • verbose – Whether to print progress on screen.

Returns

Compressed signal data set.

Return type

df
